mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ENORICREINFSGMT set INITCREDNAME = #{InitCredName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INITCEDORGCODE = #{InitCedOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGDBTCATE = #{OrigDbtCate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INITRPYSTS = #{InitRpySts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ReportFlag=#{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO = #{OrigCreditorInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO, INITCREDNAME, INITCEDORGCODE, ORIGDBTCATE, INITRPYSTS,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_ENORICREINFSGMT
